general_advisory: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are critical. Cover the rows with dry leaves in sugarcane. Apply sprinkler irrigation to reduce heat effect. High temperature increases water requirement of maize crop. Use polythene in irrigation channels. Apply Streptocyclin in tomato and brinjal to prevent wilting.
